name: In Dreams of Addict Remastered
storyline: You will play as a guy named Jora, who has fallen into a coma due to excessive alcohol consumption. You enter Jora's consciousness, consisting of his memories and deepest fears. Help Jora fight his nightmares, which are holding him back, and get out of his coma.
summary: "In Dreams of Addict Remastered" - A re-release of the original 2018 game with a new story and improved graphics. You will play as a guy named Jora, who has fallen into a coma due to excessive alcohol consumption. You enter Jora's consciousness, consisting of his memories and deepest fears. Help Jora fight his nightmares, which are holding him back, and get out of his coma.
